title: Managing Machine Learning Projects (External Course Recommendation)
company_relevance: Contoso Approved Vendor for Technical Training

content.course_description: This comprehensive course provides project managers with the specific skills and knowledge required to successfully lead Machine Learning projects. It covers the unique aspects of the ML lifecycle, data management strategies, model evaluation techniques, MLOps principles, and team management for data science projects.
learning_objectives: Understand the end-to-end ML project lifecycle and its differences from traditional software projects.
Learn techniques for defining ML project scope, objectives, and success metrics.
Develop strategies for managing data acquisition, preparation, and versioning.
Understand common ML model evaluation metrics and validation strategies.
Gain insights into MLOps practices for deploying and monitoring ML models.
Learn effective communication and collaboration techniques for working with data scientists and ML engineers.
Identify and mitigate risks specific to ML projects (e.g., data drift, model bias, scalability).

modules.title: Model Development & Evaluation
topics: Key Evaluation Metrics (Accuracy, Precision, Recall, F1, AUC)

modules.title: Team & Stakeholder Management
topics: Communicating Technical Concepts to Business Stakeholders

target_audience: Project Managers transitioning to AI/ML projects
Scrum Masters working with data science teams
prerequisites: Minimum 3 years of project management experience
Basic understanding of AI/ML concepts (Completion of TRN-AI-LEAD-2025-01 or equivalent recommended)
